subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: PHOENIX (AP) — Xavier forward C. J. Anderson remembers the first time he played against Drew Lavender, in a 16-and-under A.A.U. tournament in Ohio.
